sub_topic: Probability of a certain type of travel outcome occurring on a trip
message_1: Suppose 25% of the time a traveler misses their flight, 20% of the time they experience a delay and 55% of the time they arrive on time. What is the probability that a traveler will either miss their flight or experience a delay on a trip?
message_2:
To find the probability that a traveler will either miss their flight or experience a delay, we simply add the probabilities of these two events occurring.

Probability of missing a flight = 25% = 0.25
Probability of experiencing a delay = 20% = 0.20

Probability of either missing a flight or experiencing a delay = 0.25 + 0.20 = 0.45

So, the probability that a traveler will either miss their flight or experience a delay on a trip is 0.45 or 45%.
